specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Pleated Pleating is a heat-setting technique where fabric is placed between a two-part mould and placed inside a steaming machine.
specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Appearance > Crinkled
specifications.Care Advice: Mechanical > Pleated To prevent the pleated fabric from losing its wrinkles, we discourage ironing and rolling the fabric. Fold and store it instead.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not iron
